name: MCNearbyServiceBrowserDelegate
desc: The MCNearbyServiceBrowserDelegate protocol defines methods that a MCNearbyServiceBrowser objectâ€™s delegate can implement to handle browser-related events.

items.name: func browser(MCNearbyServiceBrowser, didNotStartBrowsingForPeers: Error)
items.desc: Called when a browser failed to start browsing for peers.

items.name: func browser(MCNearbyServiceBrowser, foundPeer: MCPeerID, withDiscoveryInfo: [String : String]?)
items.desc: Called when a nearby peer is found.

items.name: func browser(MCNearbyServiceBrowser, lostPeer: MCPeerID)
items.desc: Called when a nearby peer is lost.
